about_regi_description:
Welcome to the Customer Registration Page,Please feel free
 to fill out all the information such as Name,
 Phone, Email, birthday date, email. 
Thank You !
loaded_data_key: The Previous customer informations have been loaded!
warning_message_alert_dialog: Please Fill out all the fields.
RPalertDioalogC: Please Fill out all the fields.
RPaddResIns:
1. Adding a Reservation:
 - Enter the name of the reservation in the text field provided.
 - Press the 'Add Reservation' button to add the reservation to the list.
RPviewResIns:
2. Viewing Reservation Details:
 - Tap on any reservation in the list to view its details.
RPcopyIns:
3. Copying Previous Customer Information:
 - When adding a new customer, you can choose to copy the information from the previous customer.
RPnavIns:
4. Navigation:
 Use the back button or the app's navigation controls to go back to the home page or other sections of the app.
